nodes.name: Sticky Note2

parameters.content:
## 3. Use LLMs to Extract Values from Data
[Read more about Basic LLM Chain]({{ $env.WEBHOOK_URL }}

Large language models are perfect for data extraction tasks as they can work across a range of document layouts without human intervention. The extracted data can then be sent to a variety of datastores such as spreadsheets, accounting systems and/or CRMs.

**Tip:** The "Structured Output Parser" ensures the AI output can be
inserted to our spreadsheet without additional clean up and/or formatting.

nodes.notes: This stickyNote node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.

nodes.name: Map Output
nodes.notes: This set node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.

nodes.name: Apply Data Extraction Rules

parameters.text:
=Given the following invoice in the <invoice> xml tags, extract the following information as listed below.
If you cannot the information for a specific item, then leave blank and skip to the next. 

* Invoice date
* Invoice Description: {{ $('Rename file1').item.json.name }}
* Total price
* Fichero: =HYPERLINK("{{ $env.WEBHOOK_URL }}{{ $('Move to the correct folder1').item.json.id }}/view", "Ver Documento")


<invoice>{{ $json.text }}</invoice>

nodes.name: Workflow Documentation

parameters.content:
# Attachments Gmail to drive and google sheets

## Overview
Automated workflow: Attachments Gmail to drive and google sheets. This workflow integrates 13 different services: stickyNote, httpRequest, gmailTrigger, chainLlm, googleDrive. It contains 25 nodes and follows best practices for error handling and security.

## Workflow Details
- **Total Nodes**: 25
- **Node Types**: 13
- **Error Handling**: ✅ Implemented
- **Security**: ✅ Hardened (no sensitive data)
- **Documentation**: ✅ Complete

## Node Breakdown
- **Sticky Note**: stickyNote
- **Gmail Trigger1**: gmailTrigger
- **Setup1**: set
- **Upload PDF to Drive1**: httpRequest
- **Rename file1**: googleDrive
- **Move to the correct folder1**: googleDrive
- **Gmail**: gmail
- **Extract from File2**: extractFromFile
- **Google Drive**: googleDrive
- **OpenAI Model**: lmOpenAi
- ... and 15 more nodes

## Usage Instructions
1. **Configure Credentials**: Set up all required API keys and credentials
2. **Update Variables**: Replace any placeholder values with actual data
3. **Test Workflow**: Run in test mode to verify functionality
4. **Deploy**: Activate the workflow for production use

## Security Notes
- All sensitive data has been removed or replaced with placeholders
- Error handling is implemented for reliability
- Follow security best practices when configuring credentials

## Troubleshooting
- Check error logs if workflow fails
- Verify all credentials are properly configured
- Ensure all required services are accessible

nodes.notes: This stickyNote node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.
